product_name: Columbia Arch Cape III Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With soft fabric and a 3/4-length, Columbia Arch Cape III capri pants have all the bases covered-plus your knees-so you're comfortable while hanging out at the beach or in the backyard. Cotton/nylon fabric blend is durable and naturally breathable, and feels soft against skin. UPF 15 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand pockets; back pockets; 1 zippered side pocket. Columbia Arch Cape III capri pants feature a straight leg and regular rise. Closeout.
short_description: With soft fabric and a 3/4-length, Columbia Arch Cape III capri pants have all the bases covered-plus your knees-so you're comfortable while hanging out at the beach or in the backyard.
